  • Our brains are hardware that run on culture - software

    Our brains (hardware) run culture (software).1 Humans dominate because our software is easier to upgrade than our hardware. We can solve problems not solved by genetics alone. Culture and memes move faster than genes. Culture is transmitting information from one member to another. As our... Continue Reading »
